an6.80:4.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with six qualities soon acquires great and abundant good qualities.
an6.80:4.3: It’s when a mendicant is full of light, full of practice, full of inspiration, and full of eagerness. They don’t slack off when it comes to developing wholesome qualities. They reach further.
an6.80:4.4: A mendicant who has these six factors soon acquires great and abundant good qualities.”
